about_the_game:
Sploodie is a colorful and charming platform game in a lively cartoon style that takes you through varied and lovingly designed worlds. As the cheerful hero Sploodie, you hop, jump and fight your way through a variety of levels full of challenges, hidden secrets and tricky puzzles. Although the enemies look sweet and cute, they still offer exciting challenges to overcome. Another highlight of the game is the large selection of playable characters, all of which impress with their cute and unique appearance. These characters differ from each other purely visually, so you can choose your favorite one and steer it through the colorful levels. The game offers full controller support, making controls particularly precise and comfortable, whether you're playing alone or working together with up to six friends online in multiplayer mode. In co-op mode you can face opponents together, solve puzzles and support each other to pass the more difficult levels. With a variety of power-ups, hidden secrets and tons of cute characters, Sploodie offers a fun and accessible adventure for players of all ages - ideal for relaxing or having fun game nights with friends!

FEATURES

  • Cartoon graphic

  • Climbing system

  • Combat system

  • Different characters to choose from

  • Boss fights

  • Singleplayer

  • Multiplayer

  • Controller support
